questions.question_text_1: Two capacitors of capacitance C1 =4 μF and C2 =2 μF are connected in series and a voltage of 100 V is applied across this combination until steady state has been attained. The capacitors are now disconnected and rewired such that the plates with the same polarity are joined together making a parallel connection. Assume no charge is lost in this process. Answer the given subquestions.
